snippet: Lawyers for Jose Pimentel, who is charged with plotting terrorist bombings in New York, are negotiating a plea agreement with prosecutors, though the defense characterized the discussions as routine.
abstract: Lawyers for Jose Pimentel, who is charged with plotting terrorist bombings in New York, are negotiating a plea agreement with prosecutors, though the defense characterizes discussions as routine.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Jose Pimentel, who is charged with plotting terrorist bombings in New York, are negotiating a plea agreement with prosecutors, though the defense characterized the discussions as routine.

headline.seo: Lawyers Negotiating Plea in New York City Bomb Plot Case
headline.main: Lawyers Negotiating Plea for Terror Suspect
